name: NSAttributeDescription
desc: A description of an attribute of a Core Data entity.

items.name: var attributeValueClassName: String?
items.desc: The class name that represents the attribute’s value.

items.name: struct NSAttributeDescription.AttributeType
items.desc: The types of attributes that Core Data supports.

items.name: var allowsCloudEncryption: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to encrypt the attribute’s value.

items.name: var allowsExternalBinaryDataStorage: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute allows external binary storage.

items.name: var defaultValue: Any?
items.desc: The default value of the attribute.

items.name: var preservesValueInHistoryOnDeletion: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the attribute records its value in the persistent history transaction for a managed object’s deletion.

items.name: var valueTransformerName: String?
items.desc: The name of the transformer to use for the attribute value.

items.name: var versionHash: Data
items.desc: The version hash for the attribute.
